titleInfo.title: Country Music Awards - Album of the Year Sweepstakes promos - 1987

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Recording of a Country Music Awards Album of the Year Sweepstakes promos, featuring Reba McEntire (performer), Randy Travis (performer), Ronnie Milsap (performer), and the Judds (performers) from 1987.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
